resources.string: I am annoyed by the course registration,, so I decided to develop such an app to help planning courses.
I use algorithms to speed up the progress but it is still unsatisfactory. The computational complexity increase exponentially with the number of courses.
It will take less than 1 second to come up with more than 50 thousand candidates with 7 courses but take 30 seconds to compute out 200 candidates with 10 courses.
There are some settings in the setting page. If you have any good idea or suggestion, send me a message in app.
In this app you can plan your courses(of course -.-), save your schedule
